employeeProfileWizard.subtitleFindProfile: Search and claim your existing employee profile
employeeProfileWizard.placeholderSearch: Search by name, nickname, or nationality...
employeeProfileWizard.subtitleWelcome: Let's set up your profile. Choose the option that applies to you:
employeeProfileWizard.optionADescription: Someone else created a profile for you? Claim it to take control and manage your own information.
employeeProfileWizard.optionABenefit1: Link to your existing photos & reviews
employeeProfileWizard.optionBDescription: Start fresh with a brand new profile. Upload your photos, add your details, and manage everything yourself.
employeeProfileWizard.infoBoxQuestion: Not sure which option to choose?
employeeProfileWizard.infoBoxOptionA: Option A is best if you've been working in Pattaya and customers or colleagues may have already created a profile for you. You can search for your name or nickname and claim it.
employeeProfileWizard.infoBoxOptionB: Option B is best if you're new to Pattaya or want a completely fresh start. You'll create everything from scratch.

employeeDashboard.title: Employee Dashboard
employeeDashboard.subtitle: Manage your profile and verification status
employeeDashboard.employeeOnly: This page is only accessible to employee accounts.
employeeDashboard.technicalError: There seems to be a technical issue with your profile setup. Please contact an administrator for assistance.
employeeDashboard.verifiedDescription: Your profile now displays a verified badge to build trust with visitors.
employeeDashboard.notVerified: Your profile is not verified yet
employeeDashboard.notVerifiedDescription: Verify your profile to gain trust and stand out with a verified badge.
employeeDashboard.underReview: Your verification is under manual review.
employeeDashboard.reviewMessage: An admin will review your submission within 24 hours.
employeeDashboard.rejected: Your last verification attempt was rejected.
employeeDashboard.rejectedMessage: The photo did not match your profile photos. Please try again with a clearer selfie.
employeeDashboard.pendingApprovalTitle: Your Profile is On Its Way!
employeeDashboard.pendingApprovalMessage: Your profile is being reviewed by our team. Hang tight—this usually takes 24-48 hours. We'll notify you as soon as you're live!
employeeDashboard.pendingStep1: Our team reviews your profile and photos
employeeDashboard.pendingStep3: Once live, you can verify your identity and unlock all features
employeeDashboard.proTipMessage: Make sure your notifications are enabled so you don't miss the approval!
employeeDashboard.noReviewsYet: No reviews yet. Reviews will appear here once visitors rate your profile.
employeeDashboard.vipPurchaseSuccess: VIP purchase initiated! Awaiting admin verification.

modal.title: Verify Your Profile
modal.subtitle: Take a selfie with the mini heart pose to verify your identity
modal.pose: Make the mini heart pose (🫰) with your hand next to your face

approved.title: Verification Approved!
approved.description: Your profile is now verified. You'll see a verified badge on your profile.

manualReview.title: Manual Review Required
manualReview.description: Your verification will be reviewed manually by our team. This usually takes 1-2 business days.

rejected.title: Verification Failed
rejected.description: The photo doesn't match your profile photos well enough. Please try again with a clearer photo showing your face clearly.

error.title: Verification Error
error.description: An error occurred during verification. Please try again later.

verification.verifiedTooltip: This profile has been verified by an administrator
verification.adminVerifyConfirm: Are you sure you want to verify this employee profile?
verification.adminUnverifyConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove verification from this profile?

verificationModal.title: Verify Your Profile
verificationModal.poseDescription: Make a mini heart with your thumb and index finger next to your face
verificationModal.step1: Touch your thumb and index finger together
verificationModal.step3: Hold it next to your face
verificationModal.poseNote: Korean "Finger Heart" gesture - popular in Asian K-pop culture
verificationModal.note1: Your face must match your profile photos
verificationModal.note2: Use good lighting for best results
verificationModal.approvedMessage: Your profile now has a verified badge.
verificationModal.reviewMessage: An admin will review your submission within 24 hours.
verificationModal.rejectedMessage: The photo did not match your profile photos. Please try again with a clearer selfie.

push.title: Push Notifications
push.description: Get notified when something important happens
push.notSupported: Push notifications not supported in this browser

push.welcomeMessage: You'll now receive updates about your favorite employees
push.notSupportedMessage: Your browser doesn't support push notifications
push.notSupportedHelp: Try using Chrome, Firefox, or Edge for the best experience
push.notConfiguredMessage: Push notifications are not configured on the server. Contact an administrator.
push.permissionDeniedMessage: You blocked notifications for this site. To enable them, you need to change your browser settings.
push.step1: Click the lock icon in your browser's address bar
push.step3: Change the setting to 'Allow' and refresh the page
push.info1: New reviews on your favorite employees
push.info2: Profile updates from employees you follow
push.privacy: We respect your privacy. You can unsubscribe anytime.

messages.newVerificationRequest: {{employeeName}} submitted a verification request. Please review.
messages.verificationSubmitted: Your verification request for {{employeeName}} has been submitted. An admin will review it soon.
messages.verificationApproved: Congratulations! Your verified badge for {{employeeName}} has been approved by an admin.
messages.verificationRejected: Your verification request for {{employeeName}} was rejected. Reason: {{reason}}
messages.verificationRevoked: Your verified badge for {{employeeName}} has been revoked by an admin. Reason: {{reason}}
messages.vipPurchaseConfirmed: Your VIP {{tier}} subscription ({{duration}} days) has been confirmed. Amount: {{price}} THB. Pending admin verification.
messages.vipPaymentVerified: Congratulations! Your VIP {{tier}} subscription is now active until {{expiresAt}}. Enjoy your exclusive benefits!
messages.vipPaymentRejected: Your VIP {{tier}} payment has been rejected. Reason: {{reason}}. Please contact support or try again.
messages.vipSubscriptionCancelled: Your VIP {{tier}} subscription has been cancelled. Reason: {{reason}}. You can purchase a new subscription anytime.
messages.editProposalSubmitted: {{proposerName}} submitted an edit proposal for {{entityType}} "{{entityName}}". Please review.
messages.editProposalApproved: Great news! Your edit proposal for {{entityType}} "{{entityName}}" has been approved and applied.
messages.editProposalRejected: Your edit proposal for {{entityType}} "{{entityName}}" was rejected. Reason: {{reason}}
messages.establishmentOwnerAssigned: You have been assigned as {{role}} of "{{establishmentName}}". You can now manage this establishment from your dashboard.
messages.establishmentOwnerRemoved: Your access to manage "{{establishmentName}}" has been removed. Contact an administrator if you have questions.
messages.establishmentOwnerPermissionsUpdated: Your permissions for "{{establishmentName}}" have been updated.
messages.commentRemoved: Your comment on {{entityType}} "{{entityName}}" was removed by a moderator. Reason: {{reason}}
messages.newOwnershipRequestWithEstablishment: {{requesterPseudonym}} has requested ownership of NEW establishment {{establishmentName}} (both establishment creation and ownership need approval)
messages.ownershipRequestSubmitted: Your ownership request for {{establishmentName}} has been submitted. Admins will review it shortly.
messages.ownershipRequestWithEstablishmentSubmitt: Your request for NEW establishment {{establishmentName}} has been submitted. Admins will review both the establishment creation and ownership request.
messages.ownershipRequestApproved: Your request for {{establishmentName}} has been approved! You can now manage this establishment.
messages.ownershipRequestRejected: Your request for {{establishmentName}} has been rejected.{{#if adminNotes}} Reason: {{adminNotes}}{{/if}}
messages.employeeApproved: Your {{contentType}} "{{contentName}}" has been approved and is now visible to everyone!
messages.establishmentApproved: Your {{contentType}} "{{contentName}}" has been approved and is now visible to everyone!
messages.commentApproved: Your {{contentType}} "{{contentName}}" has been approved and is now visible to everyone!
messages.commentReply: {{replierName}} replied to your comment on {{employeeName}}'s profile
messages.commentMention: {{mentionerName}} mentioned you in a comment on {{employeeName}}'s profile
messages.favoriteAvailable: Your favorite {{employeeName}} is now available{{#if establishmentName}} at {{establishmentName}}{{/if}}
messages.contentPendingReview: 귀하의 {{contentType}} "{{contentName}}"이(가) 제출되었으며 팀의 검토를 기다리고 있습니다.

accessDenied.title: Access Denied
accessDenied.employee: This page is only accessible to employee accounts. Please create an employee profile or login with an employee account.
accessDenied.owner: This page is only accessible to establishment owners. Please request ownership or login with an owner account.
accessDenied.admin: This page is only accessible to administrators. Please contact support if you believe this is an error.
accessDenied.moderator: This page is only accessible to moderators and administrators.
accessDenied.default: You do not have permission to access this page.
